summary: Nine strangers are kidnapped and forced to figure out the connection they have to each other as one has to die every ten minutes.
cast: Melissa Joan Hart|William Lee Scott|John Terry|James C. Victor|Marc Macaulay|Lucille Soong|Chip Bent|Edrick Browne|Daniel Baldwin|Andrew Sensenig|Lawrence Turner|John Cates|Emily Hart|Gina St. John|Ritchie Montgomery|Rebecca Newman|Victor Eli Hugo|Wendy Clarice Jordan|Patrick Wehe Mahoney|Rina Nath|Jon Eyez|Joe Fredo|Jeremy Evan Kerr|Lydia Laine|Heather Saint-Noel|Michael Wozniak
title: Nine Dead
